name: owncloud
description: ownCloud is an open-source platform for file sync and sharing. It offers desktop and mobile clients, user management, versioning, and plugins for collaborative work in self-hosted deployments.
features: File Synchronization: Sync files across devices with desktop and mobile clients for seamless access anywhere.
Collaborative Sharing: Share files and folders with users or groups with granular permission controls and expiration dates.
Version Control: Maintain file history with automatic versioning and easy rollback to previous versions.
User Management: Comprehensive user and group management with LDAP integration and role-based access controls.
Web Interface: Full-featured web interface for file management, sharing, and administration from any browser.
Mobile Apps: Native iOS and Android applications with offline access and automatic photo backup capabilities.
Plugin Ecosystem: Extend functionality with hundreds of apps including calendar, contacts, and document editing.
Enterprise Features: Advanced security, compliance tools, and integration options for business environments.
External Storage: Connect to external storage systems including FTP, SMB, and cloud storage providers.
Encryption Support: Client-side and server-side encryption options to protect sensitive data at rest and in transit.
Activity Monitoring: Track file activities, user actions, and system events with comprehensive logging and notifications.
API Integration: Full REST and WebDAV APIs for custom integrations and third-party application connectivity.
